Body:
monkeypatch.setattr(Connection, 'run', lambda self, x, err_stream, timeout,
    warn: broken_ssh())
ssh_ctx = ssh.SshContext('ubuntu', get_mock_key_file(tmpdir))
with pytest.raises(ValidationFailure):
    validation = ssh.SshCommandValidation(ssh_ctx, 'citations', 'command',
        hosts=hosts)
    validation.add_expectation(ssh.OutputLessThan(validation, 90))
    validation.perform({})
